directives.name: auth
directives.description: Renders the block if the user is authenticated.

directives.name: guest
directives.description: Renders the block if the user is NOT authenticated.

directives.name: notlogged
directives.description: Renders the block if the user is NOT authenticated.

directives.name: logged
directives.description: Alias for @auth. Renders the block if the user is authenticated.

directives.name: authenticated
directives.description: Alias for @auth. Renders the block if the user is authenticated.

directives.name: user
directives.description: Injects the current user object into a variable named 'user'.

directives.name: can
directives.description: Checks if the user has a specific permission.

directives.name: notcan
directives.description: Checks if the user DOES NOT have a specific permission.

directives.name: canany
directives.description: Checks if the user has ANY of the provided permissions.

directives.name: noauth
directives.description: Renders the block if the user is NOT authenticated. Alias for @guest.
